channel.title: Help running 525 client
channel.description:
when running my server i get this error:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client2 Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client2 at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: client2. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
the command is: [code]@echo off java -Xmx256M client2 pause[/code]
what do i change for it to work?

item.title: Help running 525 client
item.dc:creator: @candy candy
item.description:
@candy wrote:

do you guys have a 525 HD client? i need it

item.title: Help running 525 client
item.dc:creator: @rawr_gf_rawr rawr_gf_rawr
item.description:
@rawr_gf_rawr wrote:

when running my server i get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client2 Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client2 at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: client2. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

the command is:

@echo off java -Xmx256M client2 pause

what do i change for it to work?
